page.title: 19Computers
page.content:
Our school has got two{BBC micro- {computers.} One belongs to the school and was bought through a Department of Industry scheme, the other belongs to Mr Peach.
We do all sorts of work on the micro computer. My favourite is an exciting adventure game where you have to explore an unknown world.
The school has just brought a{word- {processor and printer}and now we write and print a lot of things using the computer.
Several children have got their own computers at home and they seem to be getting very popular. I have got an Acorn Electron. I was given it for Christmas.
